snippet: The measures proposed by Democrats would require background checks for private gun sales and limit some kinds of ammunition.
abstract: Democratic lawmakers in Colorado, state haunted by two of the country's worst mass shootings, unveil a broad package of gun-control measures; proposal stops short of a ban on assault rifles.
lead_paragraph: The measures proposed by Democrats would require background checks for private gun sales and limit some kinds of ammunition.

headline.seo: Colorado Gun Control Proposals Face Fight
headline.main: Colorado Gun Control Proposals Face Fight
headline.print_headline: Lines Form for Colorado Debate On New Laws to Regulate Guns
